crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This signature detects an office document with an embedded VBA project. While this is fairly common it is sometimes used for malicious intent.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: This rule will monitor executable and script file creation by office applications. Please add more file extensions or magic bytes to the logic of your choice.
Detects usage of a base64 encoded "FromBase64String" cmdlet in a process command line
Detects usage of the "FromBase64String" function in the commandline which is used to decode a base64 encoded string
Detects use of executionpolicy option to set insecure policies
sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects svchost process spawning an instance of an office application. This happens when the initial word application create an instance of one of the office COM objects such as 'Word.Application', 'Excel.Application'...etc. This can be used by malicious actor to create a malicious office document with macros on the fly. (See vba2clr project in reference)
Detects the creation of a new office macro files on the systems
